title: A Newly Renovated 1 bedroom 1 bathroom with UNIT AMENITIES
map_address: 1909 Santa Paula Drive near El Centro Place
posting_body: Unit will be Newly Renovated 1 bedroom 1 bathroom with a fresh interior and all new appliances waiting for you to call "HOME" .Why
This home features beautiful Vinyl wood plank flooring throughout with a bright and airy bathroom and vanity area.
Brand new white cabinets and Granite countertops throughout the kitchen and bathroom vanity area.
Climate controlled with AC and Heater.
